DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare rate extent absorption Abrika Bupropion 150 mg sustain release tablet Wellbutrin SR sustain release tablet single , one-tablet dose fast subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Relative Bioavailability Study Bupropion Sustained Release 150 mg Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: Study Type : Interventional Study Design : Randomized , 2-period , 2-sequence , crossover design . Official Title : A Randomized , Single Dose Two -Way Crossover Relative Bioavailability Study Bupropion Sustained Release Tablets Fasted , Normal , Healthy Men . Further study detail provide Actavis Elizabeth LLC : Primary Outcome Measures : Rate Extend Absorption
DOC.criteria: Is individual healthy , normal adult man volunteer participate ? Is 1845 year age , inclusive ? Is BMI 19 30 , inclusive ? Is consider reliable capable understanding responsibility role study ? Has provide write informed consent ? A answer question indicate individual ineligible enrollment Does individual history allergy hypersensitivity bupropion ? Does clinically significant laboratory abnormality would interfere conduct interpretation study jeopardize safety ? Does significant history clinical evidence autoimmune , cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , hematological , hematopoietic , hepatic , neurological , ongoing infection , pancreatic , renal disease , condition surgery would interfere conduct interpretation study jeopardize his/her safety ? Does serious psychological illness ? Does significant history ( within past year ) clinical evidence alcohol drug abuse ? Does positive urine drug screen saliva alcohol screen , positive HIVl , hepatitis B C screen ? Has consume grapefruit grapefruit juice 7day period precede study initiation ? Is unable refrain use alcohol xanthinecontaining food beverage period begin 48 hour prior study drug administration end last blood sample take study period ? Has use prescription drug 14day period prior study initiation , OTC drug 72hour period precede study initiation ? Is unable refrain use concomitant medication study ? Has donate lose blood , participate clinical study involve withdrawal large volume blood ( 480 mL ) , six week period precede study initiation ? Has donate plasma two week period precede study initiation ? Has receive investigational drug 30 day period precede study initiation ? Is heavy smoker ( usually smoke 25 cigarette per day ? A yes answer question indicate individual ineligible enrollment
